Description: This unit has it all! 4 bedroom plus study or two separate living areas. This beautifully updated space has 2 full bathrooms, eat-in chef's kitchen, and natural light throughout. Three walls of windows, excellent closet space in each room. Location can't be beat. Easy access to McGrath highway, Assembly Row and short walk to Gilman St. T station. One off street parking space is included in the rent. Pet friendly. Available now. Professionally managed building.
